title: SOL 4 Pairs Large Household Gloves, Yellow Heavy Duty Rubber Gloves for Cleaning with Non-Slip Grip, Durable Waterproof Design for Kitchen, Bathroom & Dishwashing, Multipurpose & Comfortable To Use
features: STRONG AND DURABLE– Our kitchen gloves are comfortable, strong and tough with a non-slip grip on the palm and fingers, which is especially useful as this increases friction ensuring a firmer grip and increased control when using a sponge or cloth. Our dish washing gloves also have a soft interior to protect sensitive hands. Our household gloves are made with natural latex, are waterproof and provide excellent protection from hot water.

SIZE AND COLOUR - Each flocked lined pair of yellow gloves are Large in size and yellow, the most popular colour! The length of the kitchen glove not only keeps your arms dry and prevents water from running into the gloves, but also enables the hands to keep moving flexibly. We also sell these gloves in different sizes if these aren't the right fit for you.

MULTI - FUNCTIONAL – Our rubber gloves Large are designed to be gloves for cleaning, gloves for kitchen, washing up gloves and for just about everything including hair dressing, gardening and much more!
PROTECT YOU FROM HARMFUL LIQUIDS - Perfect for use where hazardous and dangerous chemicals are being used. Our strong, waterproof latex gloves with keep your skin protected.

VERSATILE & PRACTICAL - You will received 4 pairs of heavy duty rubber gloves, making 8 individual gloves in total, which will allow you to use a separate pair in each room and avoid cross-contamination, or to keep some as backups for when you need them.

Yes, our large rubber gloves are designed for durability and a non-slip grip, making them perfect for handling hot water and tough grime during your cleaning tasks. What size and colour are these gloves? These large gloves come in a vibrant yellow, the preferred choice for many! They're designed to keep your arms dry and allow flexible hand movement. Can I use these gloves for tasks beyond cleaning? Absolutely! Our gloves are multifunctional, ideal for gardening, household cleaning, and more, in addition to being perfect kitchen and cleaning companions. How do these gloves enhance washing up tasks? Crafted in the classic yellow design, these gloves provide a firm grip and control for washing up, ensuring your comfort and efficiency. What makes these gloves great value?
